column5: Extreme fish porn...I love it!!!
Eight thirty Newfoundland!  Neat video. That man has enough fishing memories for all of our lifetimes.
Gord Pyzer and Mike Plume Rock!!!   Great editing !!!   Love It! 8:30 Newfoundland !!   Randy Canuck

Thanks for posting this Ben...An amazing vid. Love the fish porn  Gord Pyzer is probably one of the most knowledgeable anglers I can think of.  He's one of the anglers I looked up to growing up as a kid (still do), watching him on Real Fishing Show and reading every article I could get my hands on which he authored.  A great, down to earth guy with a passion for fishing...How can anyone not like him?  Also in that vid is Doug Stange from In-Fisherman I believe...Another pivotal angler in my own fishing career.
Very cool!!
That's a great Sunday morning Vid.  Now I'm ready, If only the rain would stop.  Thanks for posting.  Clarence
cool vid , thanks for posting!!
Thanks for posting that.

I've been lucky enough to sit in on a few of Gord Pyzers seminars over the years and the man definetely knows how to hold an audience and puts on an excellent show.  Also enjoy watching him on the tube with Izumi and the  In-Fisherman gang too.
Right on...
One of the greatest fishing ambassadors in Canada for sure.
Thanks for that link. Pyzer is the man, I have always admired him. Does anyone know who did the song?
Mike Plume...www.youtube.com/watch?v=SpMdwDL6xrY  RFS
Mike Plume...     www.youtube.com/watch?v=SpMdwDL6xrY  RFS
Could not have said it any better MJL  and thanks for the post Ben
Cheers!
AWESOME!!

Great Video! Gord is one of the nicest guys you can meet and truly does have an undying passion for our sport! Congrats on all your success Gord, hopefully with many, many more years and fond memories to come!  BTW... Lew also hit it one the head, Gord's seminars are packed with great information and spectacular delivery. He really inspired me to change the way I look at seminars and how to give them.  JP

I had the privelge of spending a day on Simcoe with Gord a little while back, it was definetly one of the highlights of my fishing career! not only is he an awesome angler but he;s very intelligent , I hope to get out with him again, Kenora is so far away!
awesome video and song thanks for posting that Ben
That was great. Thank you.
awesome video and love that song
